item.title: Roblox: Spiked Codes (February 2025)
item.description:
Spiked is an exciting Roblox sports game about volleyball where you can have fun with friends or other players on the field. Spiked can offer both fun and simple gameplay with friends or acquaintances and a real competitive atmosphere.

Yens, the local currency, will definitely come in handy for your development, but it is quite difficult to get it here, especially if you are a beginner or an inactive player. To get into the game more easily and cover some of your financial needs, we recommend redeeming the Spiked codes we have prepared below.

Updated February 10, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: In this guide, you will find everything you need to get freebies. Today we've added some new codes. Hurry up and grab them to get Yen.

All Spiked Codes

Working Spiked Codes

  • 25KFAVS - Redeem this code to get 15,000 Yen. (NEW)
  • 10KLIKES - Redeem this code to get 15,000 Yen. (NEW)
  • HOTFIX1 - Redeem this code to get 20,000 Yen. (NEW)
  • MATCHQUEUES - Redeem this code to get 10,000 Yen.

Expired Spiked Codes

  • AUTOSBUGFIXES - Redeem this code to get 25,000 Yen.
  • SRY4SHUTDOWN - Redeem this code to get 20,000 Yen.
  • SPIKEDMAS - Redeem this code to get 7,500 Yen.
  • 20KFAVS - Redeem this code to get 15,000 Yen.
  • SPIKEDPATCH1 - Redeem this code to get 45,000 Yen.
  • RELEASE - Redeem this code to get 25,000 Yen.
  • PSCOMMANDS - Redeem this code to get 25,000 Yen.
  • QUICKPATCH1 - Redeem this code to get 20,000 Yen.
  • BOOMJUMPFIX - Redeem this code to get 20,000 Yen.

By redeeming the Spiked codes we found, you can greatly simplify the development process in the game, as you will receive a bunch of useful rewards, including Yen. Hurry up, because each code has a specific expiration date, so if you don't redeem it in time, you will miss out on rewards.

How to Redeem Codes for Spiked

Redeeming Spiked codes will not take you much time, especially if you are an experienced player, as a similar redemption system is often found in other Roblox games. But if you haven't done it before, follow the instructions below to understand how to proceed:

  • Launch Spiked .
  • Press the M key to open the menu. In the list on the right, find and interact with the Store button.
  • Once the Store is open, pay attention to the bottom of the menu. Here you will find the redemption section, which contains an input field. Now, enter one of the codes from the list above in the input field.
  • Finally, hit the Enter key to claim your rewards.

If everything is done correctly, the rewards will be credited to your account.

How to Get More Spiked Codes

If the rewards you have received are not enough and you want to get more Roblox codes, you can find them on the official social networks of the game. Visit them and carefully check the latest posts and you may find codes somewhere among them.

  • Official Spiked Roblox group.
  • Official Spiked Discord server.
  • Official Spiked YouTube channel.

item.title: Roblox: Duel Warriors Codes (February 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Duel Warriors Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Duel Warriors
  • How to Get More Duel Warriors Codes

Duel Warriors is a Roblox experience in which you will need to duel with other players. You will have a variety of weapons and abilities at your disposal that can be unlocked for gold. Duel with other players in different arenas to earn currency, or you can redeem Duel Warriors codes that can all be found below, as they will give you many free rewards.

Updated February 10, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: With this update we have added 2 new codes that may be useful for you to get game currency. Be sure to check back after a while to find even more freebies.

All Duel Warriors Codes

Working Duel Warriors Codes

  • raidentameemon - Redeem this code to get gems and gold. (NEW)
  • ZSVHEMAVKZ - Redeem this code to get gems and gold. (NEW)
  • beelzebub - Redeem this code to get gems and gold.
  • ares - Redeem this code to get gems and gold.
  • adam - Redeem this code to get gems and gold.
  • DUELWIN - Redeem this code to get 500 gold

Expired Duel Warriors Codes

  • buddha - Redeem this code to get gems and gold.
  • hades - Redeem this code to get gems and gold.
  • LHBRXQCWBI - Redeem this code to get gems and gold.
  • GREATSWORD - Redeem this code to get 50 gems
  • LOM2V1SPHN - Redeem this code to get gems and gold.
  • shiva - Redeem this code to get 2000 gold
  • GMZAQVRRAP - Redeem this code to get 50 gems
  • HPENTOF0V1 - Redeem this code to get 2000 gold

How to Redeem Codes for Duel Warriors

The code redemption system in the game is pretty straightforward and simple because it is similar to the one used in other Roblox games, so you shouldn't have any problems with it. However, if you do encounter any difficulties or can't find where to redeem codes, follow the step-by-step instructions below:

  • Firstly, launch Duel Warriors in Roblox .
  • Pay attention to the upper left corner of the screen, where you will find a button with 4 squares.
  • Click this button and select the Codes option from the list that appears.
  • After that, you will see a field for entering codes, in which you will need to enter, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above codes.

If everything is done correctly, you will receive a reward. However, if you are unable to redeem the code, check if you entered it correctly and if there are no extra spaces, as these are some of the most common mistakes when redeeming codes. Keep in mind that codes do eventually expire, so be sure to redeem them as soon as possible.

How to Get More Duel Warriors Codes

Also, make sure that you bookmark this page so that you don't miss any new Roblox codes, as it will be updated regularly. You can also follow the game's official social media channels, as the developers occasionally post game codes along with news, announcements, and content about the game:

  • Official Duel Warriors Roblox group.
  • Official Duel Warriors Discord server.

item.title: Dragon Quest 12 Gets Positive Update from Series Creator
item.description:
Summary

  • Series creator Yuji Horii says that Dragon Quest 12's development is progressing well.
  • Dragon Quest 12: The Flames of Fate was announced in 2020, but lack of updates has prompted some fans to become concerned.
  • Dragon Quest 1 & 2 HD-2D Remake will be released later in 2025.

Yuji Horii, the creator of Dragon Quest , said that the development team is working hard on Dragon Quest 12: The Flames of Fate . While this might seem like a somewhat scarce piece of information, it's a positive update for fans who are willing to take any news they can get. Dragon Quest 12: The Flames of Fate was announced three years ago and players have only seen a few tiny updates since, leading many to believe it might be going through a rocky development period.

Dragon Quest 11 was released in 2017 and is considered one of the masterpieces of the JRPG genre. In 2020, the series turned 25, and to celebrate, Dragon Quest 12: The Flames of Fate was revealed. However, the announcement seemed a bit premature because Square Enix has disclosed very little about the next mainline entry in the series since then. The company's focus has been on the Dragon Quest 3 Remake , released last November, and now on the upcoming remake of the duology that will see Dragon Quest 1 & 2 HD-2D Remake released in 2025.

Recently, Yuji Horii provided an update (via Automaton) on Dragon Quest 12's development to ease fan concerns. According to Horii, the team is working hard on Dragon Quest 12 , and he hopes to share new information about the game little by little. The previous Dragon Quest 12 update Horii provided came in May 2024, on what is known as Dragon Quest Day. In the video, he said the team was "working hard" on development, showing a consistent pattern in his statements about the JRPG.

Dragon Quest 12: The Flames of Fate is Progressing Smoothly

While this might seem like an inconsequential update, any positive news about Dragon Quest 12 is already good news. Past reports indicated that the game had suffered some delays and that Yu Miyake, the longtime producer of the series, was stepping down from Dragon Quest 12 . This change in production happened during a period during which Square Enix was restructuring its internal operations, canceling multiple games, and completely changing its development pipeline.

Miyake's departure left a bad impression on the most dedicated fans because, after Dragon Quest 12 was announced, Horii mentioned that the game would introduce some changes compared to previous titles. First, the new installment would feature a darker and more mature story, something unusual for the series. Second, the creator said the team was prototyping new iterations of command-based battles, suggesting that Dragon Quest 12 might not be turn-based. This revelation spurred a range of emotions in fans, who regard Dragon Quest as one of the few contemporary series maintaining its classic essence.

Until an official announcement is made about Dragon Quest 12: The Flames of Fate 's gameplay, any changes are speculative. For now, fans can either enjoy Dragon Quest 3 HD-2D Remake or await the upcoming Dragon Quest 1 & 2 HD-2D Remake while the next mainline entry is still under wraps.

item.title: Roblox: Horror Tower Defense Codes (February 2025)
item.description:
Horror Tower Defense will immerse you in a spooky adventure, a great campaign full of interesting detailed levels, and a large variety of creepy enemies. Here, you need to create a team of characters by summoning them for in-game money, but it can take quite a while to grind.

Fortunately, like in other Roblox games, you can save a lot of time in Horror Tower Defense by redeeming codes. Each of them will reward you with a bunch of freebies, including a decent amount of currency, so don't miss out.

Updated February 10, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: The developers delayed the update a bit and released 1 new code in honor of this. We have already added it to this article so you can find it below. If you have any difficulties with the redemption, you will find detailed instructions in this guide on how to get all the rewards.

All Horror Tower Defense Codes

Working Horror Tower Defense Codes

  • SORRY - Redeem this code to get Coins. (NEW)
  • Herbert - Redeem this code to get Coins.

Expired Horror Tower Defense Codes

  • squid - Redeem this code to get Coins.
  • HOLIDAYS - Redeem this code to get Coins.
  • FRIDAY - Redeem this code to get Coins.
  • HAUNTED - Redeem this code to get Coins.
  • ENDLESS - Redeem this code to get Coins.
  • TRAITS - Redeem this code to get Coins.
  • QUESTS - Redeem this code to get Coins.
  • TRADING - Redeem this code to get 300 Coins.
  • Release - Redeem this code to get 150 Coins.

In Horror Tower Defense , as in other games of this genre, a significant part of your success depends on the composition of your team. Redeeming the codes will give you a lot of currency, which is enough to summon and upgrade new units, so hurry up.

How to Redeem Codes for Horror Tower Defense

Horror Tower Defense 's redemption system is simple, and you've seen it in other Roblox games. If you haven't had any experience with redeeming codes or don't know how it works, we've prepared a step-by-step guide that you can use:

  • Launch Horror Tower Defense .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. There will be several buttons arranged in two rows. Among them, interact with the second one in the second row which says Rewards.
  • This will open the Rewards menu. Here, interact with the Codes button, which is located at the top of the menu.
  • This will open the redemption section. There will be an input field and a green Claim button below it. Now, enter one of the working codes mentioned above into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the green Claim button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Horror Tower Defense Codes

To get more Horror Tower Defense codes, be sure to visit the game's official social media. By closely following the updates and news, you will definitely not miss the publication of the next Roblox codes:

  • Official Horror Tower Defense Roblox group.
  • Official Horror Tower Defense Discord server.

item.title: Roblox: Devas of Creation Codes (February 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Devas of Creation Codes
  • How to Codes for Redeem Devas of Creation
  • How to Get More Devas of Creation Codes

Devas of Creation is arguably one of the most well-developed RPGs on Roblox . In addition to the exciting combat system, the game has a large world with various dungeons, secrets, and other activities. As is often the case with this style of game, though, you'll have to look for many different items to progress.

Fortunately, some of these items can be obtained in just a few clicks by using Devas of Creation codes. Each code can be redeemed for useful rewards like Escape Scrolls, Essence Tokens, and Reaction Tokens. With this in mind, fans of this popular Roblox game definitely won't want to miss out on them.

Updated February 10, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: At the moment, there are no active codes, but the situation can change at any time as developers add codes in honor of some events and other occasions. With that in mind, you'd better save this guide so you don't miss out on future rewards.

All Devas of Creation Codes

Working Devas of Creation Codes

  • No active codes.

Expired Devas of Creation Codes

  • DOCXmasUPD - Redeem this code for rewards.
  • DOCWeekend - Redeem this code for rewards.
  • DOC120KLikes - Redeem this code for rewards.
  • DOCXmasWeekend - Redeem this code for rewards.
  • DOCCommunityPolls - Redeem this code for rewards.
  • DOCHalloween - Redeem this code for rewards.
  • DOCFortuneCode - Redeem this code for rewards.
  • DOCDungeonCode - Redeem this code for rewards.
  • DOC115KLikes - Redeem the code to get 3 Blessed Armor Enchant Scrolls, 2 Resurrect Scrolls, 3 Trait Spins, 1 Warehouse Slot and 1 Inventory Slot.
  • WeekendEventBoostRewards - Redeem this code for rewards.
  • DOC110KLikes - Redeem this code for 2x Blessed Armor Enchant Scrolls, 2x Blessed Weapon Enchant Scrolls, and more
  • DOC105KLikes - Redeem the code to get rewards
  • DOCSpecialRewards - Redeem the code to get rewards
  • DOC100KLikes - Redeem the code to get rewards
  • DOC95KLikess - Redeem the code to get 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Blessed Escape Scroll, 2 Powerful Healing Potion, 1 Essential Blazing Shrimp Plate, and 2 Essential Shielding Elixir
  • DOC85KLikess - Redeem the code to get rewards.
  • DevasDiscord175K - Redeem the code to get 2 Resurrect Scrolls, 2 Blessed Escape Scroll, 2 Powerful Healing Potions, and 2 Essential Shielding Elixir
  • DOC75KLikes - Redeem the code to get 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Blessed Escape Scroll, 2 Powerful Healing Potion, 2 Essential Blazing Shrimp Plant and 2 Essential Shielding Elixir
  • DOC70KLikes - Redeem the code to get 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Blessed Escape Scroll, 2 Powerful Healing Potion, 2 Powerful Mana Potion and 2 Essential Shielding Elixir
  • DOC65KLikes - Redeem the code to get 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Blessed Escape Scroll, 2 Powerful Healing Potion, 2 Powerful Mana Potion, and 1 Essential Searing Fish Pie
  • DOC55KLikes - Redeem the code to get 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Blessed Escape Scroll, 2 Powerful Healing Potion, 2 Powerful Mana Potion, and 1 Essential Searing Fish Pie
  • DOC45KLikes - Redeem the code to get 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Weapon Enchant Scroll, 1 Blessed Escape Scroll, 1 Powerful Mana Potion, and 1 Essential Fortune Nut Mix.
  • DOC40KLikes - Redeem the code to get 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Weapon Enchant Scroll, 1 Mining Mastery Flask, 1 Blessed Escape Scroll, and 1 Lumbering Mastery Flask.
  • DOC35KLikess - Redeem the code to get 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Weapon Enchant Scroll, 1 Armor Enchant Scroll, 1 Mining Mastery Flask, and 1 Cooking Mastery Flask.
  • DOC30KLikess - Redeem the code to get 3500 Essence Tokens, 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Weapon Enchant Scroll, 1 Mining Mastery Flask, and 1 Crafting Mastery Flask.
  • DOC100K - Redeem code to get Essential Enchanted Nectar, 3500 Essence Tokens, Resurrect Scroll, and 100 Faction Tokens.
  • DevasReleaseCode - Redeem code to get Essential Swift Meat Omelette, 2000 Essence Tokens, Crafting Mastery Flask, and 2 Escape Scrolls.
  • DOC20KLikes - Redeem code to get a Crafting Mastery Flask, 3500 Essence Tokens, Weapon Enchant Scroll, Resurrect Scroll, and Essential Enchanted Nectar.
  • JoinedDOCGroup - Redeem code to get Resurrect Scroll, 2000 Essence Tokens, and Cooking Mastery Flash. (You must join the Devas Of Creation Roblox group to redeem.)
  • FollowDevasDiscord - Redeem code to get Essential Swift Meat Omelette, 3500 Essence Tokens, Escape Scroll, and 100 Faction Tokens.

How to Codes for Redeem Devas of Creation

Fortunately, using codes in Devas of Creation is no more difficult than it is in other Roblox games. This feature is available from the very beginning of the game, as soon as you complete the tutorial. For convenience, you can follow these steps:

  • First, launch the Devas of Creation experience on Roblox .
  • Next, complete the short tutorial if you haven't done so already.
  • Once you start the story, click on the gear icon in the upper-left corner of the screen and select the Codes option.
  • Finally, enter the code in the corresponding box and click Redeem to claim your rewards.

How to Get More Devas of Creation Codes

Now that you know about some of the rewards that Devas of Creation codes can offer, you'll probably want to know how to get more of them. Similar to other Roblox games, to do this, players should follow the developers' official pages. There, you'll not only find codes, but also news about upcoming updates and events.

  • Devas of Creation X page
  • Devas of Creation Discord server
  • Devas of Creation Roblox group
